name: The Forgotten Empire
description:
During a mission in the North Atlantic Ocean, the Royal Fleet of Great Britain was ambushed by Pirates of the Caribbean. Although the Royal Fleet fought bravely, but due to unexpected ambushes and inferiority in numbers, the Ships of the Royal Fleet were defeated and sank to the bottom of the Atlantic Ocean. However, something unexpected happened, while the other sailors drowned, Admiral Lily was sunk into the Deep Sea. Around her now is a long Forgotten World known as the Empire of Atlantis.

And then she met Seraph, a Great Warrior of the Empire of Atlantis, who had been fighting the God of the Sea Poseidon for thousands of years. As a Great Admiral, Lily was really curious about this New World, so she and Seraph embarked on a journey to explore Atlantis and learn about the intrigues of the God of the Sea Poseidon.

Now, as the Chosen One of the Empire of Atlantis, Lily must go through the most difficult challenges facing the most ferocious monsters of the Deep Sea during her journey. With diverse gameplay along with an engaging storyline, the game will not let you down when exploring the vast and challenging Deep Sea World. Combined with unique and cool skill sets, the game's combat system will immerse you in exciting battles with the fiercest and most powerful bosses of the Deep Sea. Now let's explore the Forgotten World and fight the toughest monsters of the Abyss to save Atlantis!



FEATURES:


  • Intriguing Storyline.
  • Female Protagonist.
  • In-depth Battle System.
  • Beautiful Graphics.
  • Attractive Gameplay.
  • Diverse and Attractive Skill System.

Lily - Admiral

Lily is the Great Admiral of the British Royal Fleet. Born into a noble family, from a young age, she was well trained to be a talented admiral. With ingenious leadership and iron will, she was given the honor of guarding royal merchant ships and hunting down the fiercest pirates across the Caribbean. During a mission in the North Atlantic, her Royal Fleet was ambushed by Pirates of the Caribbean. Although the Royal Fleet fought bravely, but due to unexpected ambushes and inferiority in numbers, the Ships of the Royal Fleet were defeated and sank to the bottom of the Atlantic Ocean. However, something unexpected happened, while the other sailors drowned, Admiral Lily was sunk into the Deep Sea. Around her now is a long Forgotten World known as the Empire of Atlantis. And then she met Seraph, a Great Warrior of the Empire of Atlantis, who had been fighting the God of the Sea Poseidon for thousands of years. As a Great Admiral, Lily was really curious about this New World, so she and Seraph embarked on a journey to explore Atlantis and learn about the intrigues of the God of the Sea Poseidon.

Seraph - Warrior

Seraph is a Great Warrior of the Atlantis Empire. Born and raised in Atlantis, from a young age she was raised to become a warrior to serve the ambitions of the Atlantis Empire. Thanks to her, the Atlantis Empire won many important victories and easily invaded other Small Kingdoms. However, the invasion of other kingdoms of the Atlantis Empire made the Gods angry and plunged the entire Atlantis Empire into the Deep Sea. She was plunged into the Depths of the Abyss, a place covered with Darkness and with no concept of the Existence of Light. All around her were ferocious and hungry Deep Sea Monsters that were preparing to eat her at any moment. However, she fought bravely and defeated the most ferocious monsters. Admiring the bravery of Seraph, the fiercest monster of the Deep Sea, Kraken Oceanos, surrendered and promised to defeat Poseidon with her because he was also an enemy of Kraken Oceanos.

Geneva - Mermaid

Geneva is an innocent and gentle Mermaid. She loves peace and enjoys making friends with everyone. Her friends in the Deep Sea love her very much and are ready to help her whenever she needs it. However, the peace in the Deep Sea did not last long when Poseidon appeared. Poseidon tempts all the other Mermaids to serve his legion in exchange for strength and power. Those who serve him will be empowered by him to become the Greatest Warriors of the Sea, and those who oppose will suffer death. While the other Mermaids accepted Poseidon's service, Geneva and other peace-loving Mermaids fled and sought the help of the Atlantis Empire. Because of this, Poseidon ordered the Ice Titan Demeres to hunt down and kill all these runaway Mermaids including Geneva. After thousands of years of being hunted and massacred. Now, with the arrival of the Chosen One, Geneva has teamed up with Lily to defeat the Ice Titan Demeres and end all his thousands of years of Mermaids hunting.

Misty - Archmage

Misty is a Great Mage of the Atlantis Empire. Witness her Great Empire being completely sunk into the Abyss from an early age. She was determined to learn from the oldest books with the desire to find a way to bring her Atlantis back to its former glory. And then one day, she discovered a prophecy from a dying mermaid that one day a hero from the mainland would appear and rescue everyone in Atlantis from this Abyss. However, meeting that Chosen One was not easy because Poseidon waged a war for thousands of years to massacre all the people of the Atlantis Empire. However, after seven thousand years of waiting and fighting, Lily finally appeared, the Chosen One she had been looking for all this time. In order to defeat Poseidon and bring peace to the Atlantis Empire, she accompanies Lily to work together to make miracles.
